S10tbimbk_u:4_0: tataḥ suvarṇaprabho [Tbks_2r2] saparivāra bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā praṇamya
S10tbimbk_u:4_1: bhagavato 'ntikaṃ niṣaṇṇa dharmaśravaṇārtham* atha [Tbks_2r3] bhagavāṃ sarvasatvānusaṃśayaṃ
S10tbimbk_u:4_2: jñātvā tebhyo mahājanakāyebhya dharmaśrāvaṇikebhyaḥ tasya suvarṇaprabhasya rājakumārasya
S10tbimbk_u:5: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyaṃjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇam* [Tbks_2r6] pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma :
S10tbimbk_u:6_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani ekanavatime kalpe [Tbks_2r7] vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
S10tbimbk_u:6_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannas sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
S10tbimbk_u:6_2: [Tbks_2v1] buddho bhagavāṃ buddhakṛtyam a..aśiṣyavineyakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā nirindhano 'gnir
S10tbimbk_u:7: tad eka puruṣo [Tbks_2v2] bhikṣavaḥ paruṣadaridrakṛṣikarmaṇāvaprativṛtti bhagavatā vipaśyina śāsanebhiḥ prasannāḥ bhagavato vipaśyinaḥ [Tbks_2v3] pratimāṃ kartā
S10tbimbk_u:8_0: tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye sa evāyaṃ suvarṇaprabho rājakumāra yad bhagavato vipaśyinaḥ
S10tbimbk_u:8_2: anubhūtavān* ayaṃ sa suvarṇaprabho [Tbks_2rv5] rājakumāra samāsato bhikṣava sarvāsu
S10tbimbk_u:14: [Tbks_3r2] sa kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu svargeṣu ekaikaśaḥ śatasahasrakṛtvā bhikṣava devānām indro rājā babhūva :
S10tbimbk_u:21: [Tbks_3r6] suvarṇaprabho rājakumāraḥ antike devamanuṣyāṇāṃ acyutaṃ ajaraṃ amaraṇaṃ śivaṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ labhiṣyatīti /
S10tbimbk_u:22_1: anuśṛṇutā mānuṣyajātiṣu yeṣu [Tbks_3v1] ātmahitaparahitakāmena nāma bhikṣava buddhapratimā nikaraṇīyā /
S10tbimbk_u:40: snāpayitvā pūjayitvā yasya kasyacid bhikṣavaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā buddhapratimāpuṇyaphalaniṣyanda :
S10tbimbk_u:45: [Tbks_3v7] yaḥ kaścid bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
S10tbimbk_u:61: kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāṇaṃ śāntam adhigacchatīti vadāmi bhikṣavaḥ [Tbks_4r5]
S10tbimbk_u:64: parinirvṛto 'pi adhigato nāpi buddho bhagavāṃ parinirvṛta iva buddhapratimāyā darśanād iti vadāmi bhikṣava idam avocad bhagavāṃ [Tbks_4r7] tathāparaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
S10tbimbk_u:65: kṛtvā purā kāśyapabiṃbam agryaṃ gandhodakai snāpitavāṃ dvijendraḥ /
S10tbimbk_u:66: [Tbks_4v1]puṣpai sugandhais sumanojñagandhai tenaiva puṇyena bhavād vimuktaḥ 1
S10tbimbk_u:67: yaṃ nirmalaḥ kleśamalair vimukta cittasya citteśvaratāgatiṃ syaḥ
S10tbimbk_u:68: rūpaṃ na tṛptāś ca nirīkṣya matvā tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 2 [Tbks_4v2]
S10tbimbk_u:70: labhanti nāryaḥ puruṣāś ca loke tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 3 [Tbks_4v3]
S10tbimbk_u:72: śāntaṃ padaṃ yānti narā striyo vā tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 4 [Tbks_4v4]
S10tbimbk_u:73: tyaktvā kaḍevaram ihaiva narā striyo vā
S10tbimbk_u:76: viśvasya tat phalam udāram uvāca buddhaḥ 5
S10tbimbk_u:81: yāvantaḥ paramāṇavo bhagavata stūpeṣu biṃbasya vā / [Tbks_4v7]
S10tbimbk_u:82: tat kartum* divi bhūtale ca niyataṃ tāvanti rājyāni te /
S10tbimbk_u:83: buddhānāṃ khalu dhātave bhagavatā śarīrā ni ca nirmitā / [Tbks_5r1]
S10tbimbk_u:86: ye martyāḥ kārayitvā pramuditamanasā pūjayante yathāvat [Tbks_5r2]
S10tbimbk_u:87: svarge saktye ca rūpaṃ nayanaratikaraṃ śuddhacāmīkarābham*
S10tbimbk_u:88: te labdhāś śāntikāmā sukham idam atulaṃ prāpnuvanty āvajuṣṭaṃ // 8 [Tbks_5r3]
S10tbimbk_u:89_0: ity evādiprakārāṃ suvarṇaprabhavasuyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā paṃcaśatasahasra [Tbks_5r4]
S10tbimbk_u:89_2: [Tbks_5r5] sarvaṃ gārhasthyam apahāya tathaiva śāsane pravrajita
S10tbimbk_u:90_0: yoniśa sa manaskāraṃ kṛtvā sarvakleśaprahāṇā arhatvaṃ strīparivārās [Tbks_5r6] samaloṣṭakāṃcana
S10tbimbk_u:90_1: samacittāḥ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyā apahṛtabhārāḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojana vimuktās saṃsārabandhanās
S10tbimbk_u:92: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandam* bhikṣavaś caturdiśasaṃkhyārhatvaṃ babhūvu /
